description: Installation of brise-soleil shading to south facade incorporating photovoltaic and solar thermal collectors and a single photovoltaic panel.  Installation of vertical greening panels to external staircase.  Insertion of new entrance door in former window opening to rear building within courtyard, and alterations to railings, to facilitate access to a new internal cycle store, as well as the planting of a green roof.  Replacement of courtyard timber gates to Sutton Lane with a new single timber gate.  Replacement of high level timber fence panel above courtyard gate with vertical greening panel.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
